feed.title: Google Cloud: Policy Controller
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Policy Controller

entry.content: Policy Controller is now available as part of the standard GKE offering and no longer requires GKE Enterprise. For more details on the removal of GKE Enterprise, see the GKE release notes.
entry.summary: Policy Controller is now included in the standard GKE offering, simplifying access and removing the GKE Enterprise requirement. This change makes powerful policy management more accessible for all GKE users.
entry.title: Announcement: Policy Controller Now in GKE Standard

entry.summary: Policy Controller version 1.20.4 has been released.
entry.title: Changed: Policy Controller 1.20.4 Now Available

entry.summary: Policy Controller version 1.20.3 has been released.
entry.title: Changed: New Policy Controller version available
